article_title: Hamas support soars in West Bank - but full uprising can still be avoided
sentence: There  is  anger  at  almost  20,000  Palestinians  killed  in  Gaza,  and  support  for  Hamas  is  rising.

article_title: Hamas support soars in West Bank - but full uprising can still be avoided
sentence: More  than  270  people  have  been  killed  by  Israeli  forces  in  the  West  Bank  since  Hamas  attacked  Israel  on  7  October  -  including  70  children  -  according  to  the  UN.

article_title: Hamas support soars in West Bank - but full uprising can still be avoided
sentence: That's  more  than  half  the  total  number  killed  this  year.

article_title: Hamas support soars in West Bank - but full uprising can still be avoided
sentence: Four  Israelis  -  including  three  from  the  armed  forces  -  have  been  killed  by  Palestinians  there  in  the  same  period.
